section.name: Avalon Products

strong.em: WARNING: Documents in this section are no longer up-to-date.

p.em: We are working on moving the essential content into the main site documentation, especially the "Developing with Avalon" book.

section.p: Avalon consists of a number of products and sub-projects supporting service and component management.

td.p: The framework collection includes a component meta model used to describe component dependencies towards a container, the classic framework APIs that describe the runtime contact between a container and a component, and container utilities
A container is a platform supporting the management of components. This page provides links to Merlin - Avalon's reference implementation, general containment theory and background.
The components page provides a summary of the main component groups in Avalon and overall component repository management strategies.
